entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 11:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
